Compressed file tables
Compressed in gzlib format.
Compressed page size, in bytes. This value is unique in the table; other values are totals which refer to pages of this size.

trans-unit.source: Compressed tables are a read-only format, created with the myisampack tool. This can be done while the server is running, but external lock must not be disabled. myisamchk is used to uncompress them.
trans-unit.target: 压缩表是一种只读格式，由myisampack工具创建。可以在服务器运行时完成此操作，但是不能禁用外部锁定。myisamchk用于解压缩它们。

trans-unit.source: Compressed tables are not indexable.
Compressed tables have a number of characteristics:

Compresses a string and returns the result as a binary string. This function requires MariaDB to have been compiled with a compression library such as zlib. Otherwise, the return value is always NULL. The compressed string can be uncompressed with UNCOMPRESS().
trans-unit.target: 压缩字符串并将结果作为二进制字符串返回。此功能要求MariaDB已使用zlib等压缩库进行编译。否则，返回值始终为 NULL 。可以使用 UNCOMPRESS() 将压缩后的字符串解压缩。

trans-unit.source: Compression
Compression / Archive
Compression Algorithms
Compression Settings

Compression is fully transparent. Events are compressed on the master before being written into the binary log, and are uncompressed by the I/O thread on the slave before being written into the relay log. The mysqlbinlog command will likewise uncompress events for its output.
trans-unit.target: 压缩是完全透明的。事件在写入二进制日志之前先在主服务器上进行压缩，然后在写入中继日志之前由从属服务器上的I / O线程进行解压缩。该mysqlbinlog可以命令将同样解压事件的输出。

trans-unit.source: Compression is set on a per-Column Family basis. See MyRocks Column Families.
trans-unit.target: 压缩是基于每个列族设置的。请参见MyRocks列系列。

trans-unit.source: Compression level (0 for no compression, 1 for compression) can be set at the system level. If a session default exists, this will override the system default. In turn, this can be overridden by the table level compression comment, and finally a compression comment at the column level.
trans-unit.target: 压缩级别(0表示不压缩,1表示压缩)可以在系统级别设置。如果存在会话默认值,这将覆盖系统默认值。反过来,这可以被表级压缩注释覆盖,最后在列级压缩注释。

trans-unit.target: 压缩库。在rocksdb_supported_compression_types中列出了受支持的压缩库。像上面这样编译，我得到：

trans-unit.source: Compression mode
Compression settings
Compression settings are not dynamic parameters, one cannot change them by setting @@rocksdb_update_cf_options.
trans-unit.target: 压缩设置不是动态参数，无法通过设置 @@rocksdb_update_cf_options 来更改它们。

trans-unit.source: Compression will have the most impact when events are of a non-negligible size, as each event is compressed individually. For example, batch INSERT statements that insert many rows or large values, or row-based events that touch a number of rows in one query.
trans-unit.target: 当事件的大小不可忽略时,压缩的影响最大,因为每个事件都会被单独压缩。例如,插入许多行或大值的批量INSERT语句,或在一次查询中触及多行的基于行的事件。

Connect_Retry
Connected user.
Connecting From a Lot of Different Machines
Connecting host.
Connecting slave requested to start from GTID %u-%u-%llu, which is not in the master's binlog
trans-unit.target: 连接的从站要求从GTID %u-%u-%llu开始,而这个GTID不在主站的binlog中。

trans-unit.source: Connecting slave requested to start from GTID %u-%u-%llu, which is not in the master's binlog. Since the master's binlog contains GTIDs with higher sequence numbers, it probably means that the slave has diverged due to executing extra errorneous transactions
trans-unit.target: 连接的从机请求从GTID %u-%u-%llu开始,而主机的binlog中没有这个GTID。由于主站的binlog中包含了序列号较高的GTID,这可能意味着从站由于执行了额外的无错误事务而发生了分歧。

Connection information stored in the master.info file is immediately reset using any values specified in the corresponding startup options. This information includes values such as master host, master port, master user, and master password. If the slave SQL thread was in the middle of replicating temporary tables when it was stopped, and RESET SLAVE is issued, these replicated temporary tables are deleted on the slave.

trans-unit.source: Cons: Needs locking (= serialization at access), requires thread-safe data structures,
trans-unit.target: 缺点:需要锁定(=访问时序列化),需要线程安全的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: Consecutive Lock Mode
Conservative Mode of In-Order Parallel Replication
trans-unit.target: 保守的订单式并行复制模式。

trans-unit.source: Conservative mode of in-order parallel replication is currently the default mode, but it can also be configured by setting the slave_parallel_mode system variable to conservative on the slave.
trans-unit.target: 顺序并行复制的保守模式是当前的默认模式，但是也可以通过将 slave_parallel_mode 系统变量设置为slave上的 conservative 模式来进行配置。

trans-unit.source: Conservative mode of in-order parallel replication uses the group commit on the master to discover potential for parallel apply of events on the slave. If two transactions commit together in a group commit on the master, they are written into the binlog with the same commit id. Such events are certain to not conflict with each other, and they can be scheduled by the parallel replication to run in different worker threads.
trans-unit.target: 有序并行复制的保守模式使用主服务器上的组提交来发现在从服务器上并行应用事件的可能性。如果两个事务在主服务器上的组提交中一起提交，则它们将以相同的提交ID写入二进制日志。这样的事件肯定不会互相冲突，并且可以由并行复制安排它们在不同的工作线程中运行。

trans-unit.source: Conservative mode of in-order parallel replication was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 有序并行复制的保守模式在MariaDB 10.0中引入。

trans-unit.source: Consider the pattern \d+foo applied to the subject string 123bar. Once the engine scans 123 and fails on the letter b, it would normally backtrack to 2 and try to match again, then fail and backtrack to 1 and try to match and fail again, and finally fail the entire pattern. In case of an atomic group (?>\d+)foo with the same subject string 123bar, the engine gives up immediately after the first failure to match foo. An atomic group with a quantifier can match all or nothing.
trans-unit.target: 考虑应用于主题字符串 123bar 的模式 \d+foo 。一旦引擎扫描 123 并在字母 b 上失败，它将通常回溯到 2 并尝试再次匹配，然后失败并回溯到 1 并尝试匹配并再次失败，最后使整个模式失败。如果原子组 (?>\d+)foo 具有相同的主题字符串 123bar ，则引擎在首次失败与 foo 匹配后会立即放弃。具有量词的原子团可以匹配全部或不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Costa Rica

Costly queries can be more efficient when it is possible to fully push down part of the execution plan on each backend and reduce the result afterwards. Spider enables such execution with some direct execution shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 如果能够在每个后端完全推倒一部分执行计划,并在事后减少结果,那么成本高昂的查询就会更有效率。Spider通过一些直接执行的快捷方式实现了这样的执行。

trans-unit.source: Counter Values to Watch
Counter description.
Counter status is not persistent, and will be reset when the server restarts. It is possible to use the options on the command line, or the innodb_monitor_enable option only in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 计数器状态不是永久性的，并且在服务器重新启动时将被重置。可以在命令行上使用这些选项，或者仅在配置文件中使用 innodb_monitor_enable 选项。

trans-unit.source: Counters can also be reset. Resetting sets all the *_COUNT_RESET values to zero, while leaving the *_COUNT values, which perform counts since the counter was enabled, untouched. Resetting is performed with the innodb_monitor_reset (for individual counters) and innodb_monitor_reset_all (for all counters) system variables.
trans-unit.target: 计数器也可以重置。重置 *_COUNT_RESET 所有* _COUNT_RESET值设置为零，同时保持 *_COUNT 值不变，该值将自启用计数器以来执行计数。重置与执行innodb_monitor_reset（用于单个计数器）和innodb_monitor_reset_all（所有计数器）系统变量。

Current versions of this patch fix a bug in the following optimization: in certain queries with DISTINCT MariaDB can ignore this clause if it can prove that all result rows are unique anyway, for example, when a primary key is compared with a constant. Sometimes this optimization was applied incorrectly, though — for example, when comparing a string with a date constant. This is now fixed.
trans-unit.target: 此修补程序的当前版本修复了以下优化中的错误：在使用 DISTINCT 的某些查询中，如果可以证明所有结果行仍然是唯一的（例如，将主键与常量进行比较），MariaDB可以忽略此子句。但是，有时有时会错误地应用了此优化，例如，在将字符串与日期常量进行比较时。现在，此问题已解决。

Currently replication works only with the InnoDB storage engine. Any writes to tables of other types, including system (mysql.*) tables are not replicated (this limitation excludes DDL statements such as CREATE USER, which implicitly modify the mysql.* tables — those are replicated). There is however experimental support for MyISAM - see the wsrep_replicate_myisam system variable)
trans-unit.target: 当前，复制仅适用于InnoDB存储引擎。不会复制任何其他类型的表，包括系统（mysql。*）表（此限制不包括DDL语句，如CREATE USER，它隐式修改mysql。*表-已复制）。但是，有针对MyISAM的实验性支持-请参见wsrep_replicate_myisam系统变量）

trans-unit.source: Currently, Aria 2.0 is on hold as its developers are focusing on improving MariaDB. However, they are interested in working with interested customers and partners to add more features to Aria and eventually release 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 目前,Aria 2.0处于搁置状态,因为其开发者正专注于改进MariaDB。不过,他们有兴趣与感兴趣的客户和合作伙伴合作,为Aria增加更多的功能,并最终发布2.0。

trans-unit.source: Currently, Aria does not support encryption on tables where the ROW_FORMAT table option is set to the FIXED or DYNAMIC values.
trans-unit.target: 当前，Aria在 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 FIXED 或 DYNAMIC 值的表上不支持加密。

trans-unit.source: Currently, Aria does not support manually encrypting tables through the ENCRYPTED and ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table options. For more information, see MDEV-18049.
trans-unit.target: 当前，Aria不支持通过 ENCRYPTED 和 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项手动加密表。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-18049。

trans-unit.source: Currently, Cassandra SE is only able to access Cassandra 1.2's column families that were defined WITH COMPACT STORAGE attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当前，Cassandra SE仅能够访问由 WITH COMPACT STORAGE 属性定义的Cassandra 1.2的列系列。

trans-unit.source: Currently, EXISTS->IN conversion works only for subqueries that are at top level of the WHERE clause, or are under NOT operation which is directly at top level of the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 当前，EXISTS-> IN转换仅适用于处于WHERE子句顶层或处于NOT操作的子查询，该子查询直接位于WHERE子句顶层。

trans-unit.source: Currently, MariaDB Galera Cluster only supports the InnoDB storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 当前，MariaDB Galera Cluster仅支持InnoDB存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: Currently, MariaDB does not directly support the transport of tablespaces from partitioned tables. See MDEV-10568 for more information about that. It is still possible to transport partitioned tables if we use a workaround. You can copy the transportable tablespaces of a partitioned table from one server to another by exporting the tablespace file of each partition from the original server, and then importing the tablespace file of each partition into the new server.
trans-unit.target: 当前，MariaDB不直接支持从分区表传输表空间。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-10568。如果使用解决方法，仍然可以传输分区表。您可以通过从原始服务器导出每个分区的表空间文件，然后将每个分区的表空间文件导入新服务器，来将一个分区表的可传输表空间从一台服务器复制到另一台服务器。

trans-unit.source: Currently, all MySQL types are supported in MariaDB.
Currently, foreign keys are only supported by InnoDB.
Currently, only incremental variants of the block-based join algorithms can be used for nested outer joins and nested semi-joins.
trans-unit.target: 目前,基于块的连接算法的增量变体只能用于嵌套外连接和嵌套半连接。

trans-unit.source: Currently, queries are never parallelized, even when they involve multiple partitions.
trans-unit.target: 目前,即使涉及多个分区,查询也从不并行。

trans-unit.source: Currently, some restrictions apply to ODBC tables:
trans-unit.target: 目前,一些限制适用于ODBC表。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the LOCKLESS option depends on features unsupported by MariaDB Server. See the description of the xtrabackup_binlog_pos_innodb file for more information. If you attempt to run Mariabackup with this option, then it causes the utility to exit with an error.
trans-unit.target: 当前， LOCKLESS 选项取决于MariaDB Server不支持的功能。有关更多信息，请参见 xtrabackup_binlog_pos_innodb 文件的描述。如果尝试使用此选项运行Mariabackup，则它将导致实用程序退出并出现错误。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the MAC address of an interface is taken into account only on FreeBSD and Linux. On other operating systems, MariaDB uses a randomly generated 48-bit number.
trans-unit.target: 目前,只有在FreeBSD和Linux上才会考虑到接口的MAC地址,在其他操作系统上,MariaDB使用随机生成的48位数字。在其他操作系统上,MariaDB使用随机生成的48位数字。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the [Next] button probably has a url something like ?topic=xyz&page=4999&limit=10 The 'topic' (or 'tag' or 'provider' or 'user' or etc) says which set of items are being displayed. The product of page*limit gives the OFFSET. (The "limit=10" might be in the url, or might be hard-coded; this choice is not relevant to this discussion.)
trans-unit.target: 当前，[Next]按钮可能具有类似？topic = xyz＆page = 4999＆limit = 10的url。“ topic”（或“ tag”或“ provider”或“ user”等）表示正在显示哪一组项目。页面*限制的乘积给出偏移量。（“ limit = 10”可能在URL中，或者可能是硬编码的；此选择与该讨论无关。）

trans-unit.source: Currently, the only available procedure is ANALYSE, which examines the resultset and suggests the optimal datatypes for each column. It is defined in the sql/sql_analyse.cc file, and can be used as an example to create more Procedures.
trans-unit.target: 当前，唯一可用的过程是ANALYZE，它检查结果集并建议每列的最佳数据类型。它在 sql/sql_analyse.cc 文件中定义，并且可以用作创建更多过程的示例。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the table it uses is named PERCONA_SCHEMA.xtrabackup_history, but expect that name to change in future releases. See MDEV-19246 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 当前，它使用的表名为 PERCONA_SCHEMA.xtrabackup_history ，但是希望该名称在将来的版本中有所更改。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19246。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the zlib compression algorithm is used to compress events.
trans-unit.target: 目前,采用zlib压缩算法对事件进行压缩。

trans-unit.source: Currently, you cannot delete from a table and select from the same table in a subquery.
trans-unit.target: 目前,不能在子查询中从表中删除和从同一表中选择。

trans-unit.source: Cursors
Cursors are created with a DECLARE CURSOR statement and opened with an OPEN statement. Rows are read with a FETCH statement before the cursor is finally closed with a CLOSE statement.
trans-unit.target: 游标使用DECLARE CURSOR语句创建，并使用OPEN语句打开。在最后使用CLOSE语句关闭游标之前，使用FETCH语句读取行。

trans-unit.source: Cursors in Oracle mode
Cursors must be declared before HANDLERs, but after local variables and CONDITIONs.
trans-unit.target: 游标必须在 HANDLER 之前声明，但必须在局部变量和 CONDITION 之后声明。

trans-unit.source: DBRoot - DBroot #1 assigned to Performance Module #1
DBRoot : 1 DBroot per 1 Performance Module

trans-unit.source: DBRoots are the MariaDB ColumnStore Datafile containers or directories. For example on a root install, they are /usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/data<N> where N is the dbroot number.
trans-unit.target: DBRoots是MariaDB ColumnStore数据文件容器或目录。例如，在root用户安装中，它们是/ usr / local / mariadb / columnstore / data <N>，其中N是dbroot号。

trans-unit.source: DBRoots can be linked to other locations with more capacity if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要,可以将DBRoots与其他容量较大的地点连接起来。
